Lucy Harlow, Ph.D.

Online and Oxford-based private tutor

Thank you so much for visiting my site! I'm an innovative and inspiring teacher, with special expertise in literature, creative writing, and classical music. I offer one-on-one and small group teaching to all ages.

As a tutor I specialise in English language and literature, creative writing, and music -- piano and theory. However, I have an unusually diverse range of interests and expertise beyond this! I'm driven by compassion and curiosity, and consider myself a multipotentialite. I'm able to synthesise my many areas of knowledge and draw on them imaginatively to connect with students.
